name: culturehub-lamama-a-few-deep-breaths
description: Repo for CultureHub & LaMaMa ETC Experiments in Digital Storytelling for "A Few Deep Breaths"

scripts.build: parcel build src/index.html src/admin/index.html src/broadcaster/index.html src/feed/index.html
scripts.production: parcel build src/index.html src/admin/index.html src/broadcaster/index.html src/feed/index.html && forever start server/index.js
